text: David Steele (born August 13, 1953 in Jacksonville, Florida) is an American sportscaster with the Orlando Magic. He was the play-by-play announcer for the Florida Gators football team. He was the play-by-play announcer for the Western Carolina Catamounts football and basketball teams and the Orlando Renegades of the United States Football League. Category:National Basketball Association broadcasters Category:College basketball broadcasters Category:College football broadcasters Category:Living people Category:1953 births
title: David Steele
